name: Bitcoin Celebreties
description:
The world's most exclusive and decentralized Ordinal collection. Devoid of a team, website, Discord, or any centralized entity - it operates in a truly decentralized manner, much like Bitcoin itself.

Without traits, the celebrity status becomes the sole driver of demand.

Following the BTC halvings, the selling price doubles with every 7 celebrities sold. In anticipation, after 7 sales, the floor price will double & align:

Celeb  1- 7:   0.0016 BTC
